name: 蘇威豪
objective:
本課程旨在探討供應鏈管理相關之基本議題。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、供應鏈管理之相關功能、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
This course intends to introduce fundamental issues regarding supply chain management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, supply chain management functions, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.
